price: 11. Mapinga oyo basangisi awa, ekosalaka eloko te sé bokweisami. (lokola lolenge ezalelaki ba ahzâb kala.)
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
